text: Anthony Eze Enwereuzor is a Nigerian politician and member of the 4th National Assembly representing Aba North/Aba South constituency of Abia State under the flagship of the All Nigeria Peoples Party. ==See also== * Nigerian National Assembly delegation from Abia ==References== Category:People from Abia State Category:Living people Category:Igbo politicians Category:All Nigeria Peoples Party politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Anthony Eze Enwereuzor
